message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. I believe it's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth significantly more to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9000 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While $9000 is closer to my desired price,  I'm still not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $9250. This is a fair price considering the value this product holds for you. Let's meet in the middle.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $9100. This is the highest amount I can afford for the product while staying within my budget.
